Search the web, research papers, and pro: Search the web, research papers, and proprietary datasets with intelligent query processing.
Search the web, research papers, and proprietary datasets to retrieve relevant context.
Extract clean, structured content from w: Extract clean, structured content from web pages with optional AI-powered summarization.
Get AI-generated answers using search re: Get AI-generated answers using search results. Combines web/proprietary search with AI processing.
Create an asynchronous deep research tas: Create an asynchronous deep research task that searches multiple sources and generates detailed reports.
Create a batch for processing multiple D: Create a batch for processing multiple DeepResearch tasks with shared configuration.
List all available datasources with meta: List all available datasources with metadata, schemas, and pricing. Useful for discovering available data sources.
Make a custom API call to a specific end: 将一个自定义 API 调用到一个特定的终点
The search query to find relevant conten: The search query to find relevant content.
Maximum number of results to return (1-2: Maximum number of results to return (1-20 for standard API keys, up to 100 with special API key).
Type of search to perform. 'web' searche: Type of search to perform. 'web' searches web content. 'proprietary' uses Valyu's full-text multimodal indices. 'news' returns only news articles.
Enable fast mode for reduced latency but: Enable fast mode for reduced latency but shorter results. Best for general purpose queries.
Maximum price in dollars for a thousand: Maximum price in dollars for a thousand retrievals (CPM). Only applies when provided.
Specific sources to search (URLs, domain: Specific sources to search (URLs, domains or dataset names).
Specific sources to exclude from search: Specific sources to exclude from search (URLs, domains, or dataset names).
Natural language category/guide phrase t: Natural language category/guide phrase to help guide the search (e.g., "agentic use-cases").
Controls the length of content returned: Controls the length of content returned per result.
2-letter ISO country code to bias search: 2-letter ISO country code to bias search results (e.g., US, GB, DE).
When set to true, only returns URLs for: When set to true, only returns URLs for results (no content). Only applies when search_type is web or news.
URLs to extract content from (1-10 URLs: URLs to extract content from (1-10 URLs per request).
Maximum cost limit in dollars for the en: Maximum cost limit in dollars for the entire request.
Capture page screenshots. Results will i: Capture page screenshots. Results will include a screenshot_url field.
Enable AI-powered processing of the cont: Enable AI-powered processing of the content.
The question or topic to get an AI-gener: The question or topic to get an AI-generated answer for.
Custom instructions for AI processing (u: Custom instructions for AI processing (up to 2000 characters).

Specific sources to exclude from search.

End date filter for search results (YYYY: End date filter for search results (YYYY-MM-DD).

Enable SSE streaming. Returns search res: Enable SSE streaming. Returns search results first, then content deltas.
Natural language strategy instructions (: Natural language strategy instructions (e.g., "Focus on peer-reviewed sources").
Restrict search to specific source types: Restrict search to specific source types.

Filter content published on or after thi: Filter content published on or after this date (YYYY-MM-DD).
Filter content published on or before th: Filter content published on or before this date (YYYY-MM-DD).
Previous deep research IDs to use as con: Previous deep research IDs to use as context (max 3).
